message.value: Prospect cannot be added to the sequence

value.value: Prospect is active in this sequence.

boolean-condition-2.title: Prospect Found?
boolean-condition-2.description:
1) Check if the Prospect Id is found in Outreach 
2) Check if the Custom 1 field is available in Outreach. It is synced from Current Product Family from Contact record.

If any of these is missing then we have added a delay. If it is still missing after the delay, flow terminates

message.value: Prospect cannot be added to the sequence: {$.steps.object-helpers-1.result.errors[0].detail}
Prospect with email '{$.steps.salesforce-1.records[0].OpportunityContactRoles.records[0].Contact.Email}' is not found OR Current Product Family (custom1) is Empty.

value.value: (SELECT Contact.Id, Contact.Email FROM OpportunityContactRoles  WHERE IsPrimary = TRUE)

boolean-condition-3.title: Prospect Found?
boolean-condition-3.description:
1) Check if the Prospect Id is found in Outreach 
2) Check if the Custom 1 field is available in Outreach. It is synced from Current Product Family from Contact record.

If any of these is missing then flow terminates.
